channel.title: Abouts on Siobhán Keating, Technical Writer

item.title: Siobhán Keating - Technical Writer
item.description: I am a technical writer I love to write and I feel my writing helps people understand technology and apply knowledge in their use of an application or system. I have 20 year’s experience working in the IT sector. I include here some generic examples of my writing, to demonstrate what technical writing means to me and to describe my experience of the docs-as-code workflow. What is a Technical Writer?
